code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with mild persistent fatigue, mild bleeding between periods and mild heavy menstural bleeding. These symptoms are present for about 11 days. patient is a 31 year old female. o:Height 62 in, Weight 105 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed IRON - 65 mg daily, and ordered CBC.

td.content: s:patient presents with 3 years history of mild bleeding between periods. she is a white female aged 32 years. o:Height 61 in, Weight 102 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 16 a:Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed IRON - 65 mg daily, and ordered CBC, serum iron, TIBC.
